parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Main parameter: maximum probability of an abnormal event

parameters.name: n_init
parameters.description: Calibration: number of data used to calibrate algorithm. The user must ensure that n_init * (1 - level) > 10

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Calibration: proportion of initial data (n_init) not involved in the tail distribution fit during initialization. The user must ensure that n_init * (1 - level) > 10

parameters.name: alert
parameters.description: Enable alert triggering, if false, even out-of-bounds-data will be taken into account for tail fit

parameters.name: bounded
parameters.description: Performance: enable memory bounding (also improves performance)

parameters.name: max_excess
parameters.description: Performance: maximum number of data stored to perform the tail fit when memory bounding is enabled

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.description: Seed for the random number generator
